downloadDescription: The Microsoft Report Viewer 2015 Runtime redistributable package, includes controls for viewing reports designed using Microsoft reporting technology.
detailsSection: The Microsoft Report Viewer control enables applications that run on the .NET Framework to display reports designed using Microsoft reporting technology. This redistributable package contains Windows and Web versions of the Report Viewer.
systemRequirementsSection:
Pre-requisites:

  • Microsoft SQL Server 2008 Reporting Services or higher for server processing mode.
  • NET Framework 3.5 SP1 or .NET Framework 4.0.
  • Check C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64
  • NET Framework 3.5 is there if we see a folder named v3.5. Further, use the registry to see whether SP1 for v3.5 is there http://support.microsoft.com/kb/318785
  • HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\NET Framework Setup\NDP\v3.5 needs to have DWORD named Install with value 1
  • If SP1 is not installed, it can be installed from the Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1
  • NET Framework 4.0 is there if we see a folder named v4.0
  • Microsoft SQL Server System CLR Types package
  • It is available in the Install Instructions section of the Microsoft® SQL Server® 2014 Feature Pack page.
    • Microsoft® System CLR Types for Microsoft® SQL Server® 2014
  • Ensure this order of setup
  • Ensure we have the required .NET Framework version per step 1a.
  • Run the SQL Server System CLR Types setup from step 1b.
  • Run the Report Viewer 2015 runtime setup
installInstructionSection:
1. On this page, click Download to start the download.
  2. Save the download on your device by clicking, "Save".
  3. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection: • Help improve the Reporting Services Add-in by submitting bugs to the Connect Feedback Center.
